Title: Ava
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Matt O'Brien, Matt O'Brien (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Phil Augusta Jackson (story editor), Tricia McAlpin (story editor), Justin Noble (story editor), David Phillips (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake entertains Terry's pregnant wife, Sharon, until her water breaks sooner than expected and crisis ensues at the precinct.
